title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial: Tucker Theater
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Films     Tucker Theater                Tucker Theater      Now Showing: Monument to the DreamDuring construction the movie will be showing for free! Description: How did they build it? Come see this award-winning film and find out how the Gateway Arch was built. This 28-minute film documents the construction and meaning of the Gateway Arch and is shown daily at Tucker Theater in the Gateway Arch Visitor Center.
